name: Jawa Ion Gun (V)
Lore: 'Cobbled-together weapon built from salvaged power cells, droid restraining bolts and an ion accelerator. Fires a stream of ion energy that stuns droids and irritates others.',
Text: 'Use 1 Force to deploy on your Jawa. May target a character or vehicle. Draw destiny. Vehicle hit and power = 0, if destiny + X > defense value, where X = the number of Jawas present. Character excluded from battle if destiny = defense value.',
